Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have been very interested lately in the JDiminishingRTG mod, which I used to use a long time ago in 1.1.3. I used to code a long time ago and figured I'd take a whack at a recompile, however something appears to be broken and I have no idea how to fix it to be honest. Even back when I did code it was at a novice level.

So I'm requesting if someone could please take a look at it and see if they can make it work properly. The recompile I did does run, and does allow diminishing power over a half life as intended, however the switching between different types of fuels for the RTG seems to be broken. In the VAB the display for EC output is bugged and displays the wrong value when switching between fuels, and when you change the fuel and then launch the vessel it appear no matter which fuel you selected in the editor, it will only output the amount of power provided by the first fuel config.

Thanks,

 

 

Also I'm gonna tag @linuxgurugamer because he is awesome at reviving old mods. *fingers crossed*

 

EDIT: Also I am aware that NearFutureElectrical offers RTG Half Life functionality. However it is the switching between different types of isotopes for use in RTG's that is the reason I am so interested in JDiminishingRTG.

Edited March 2, 2019 by CoriW

I think this mod is pretty close to it https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/151164-14x-real-battery-v141/

EDIT- Take that back that one looks like just batterys

Edited March 3, 2019 by Mecripp
I'll take a look at it

Well, I can't say I'm impressed with the code, there are a number of issues with it.

However, I do have it working now, but I need to go through all the code to do some cleanup

2 hours ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Well, I can't say I'm impressed with the code, there are a number of issues with it.

However, I do have it working now, but I need to go through all the code to do some cleanup

Thanks so much, take as much time as is necessary. I'm just happy to hear you've got it working.
